mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `name`, `menucode`, `parentid`, `nodetype`, `iconurl`, `sort`, `linkurl`, `level`, `path`, `isdelete` FROM `sk_item`.`menu_info` where parentid =#{pid} and nodetype = #{nodeType}
